name: opelvv

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(< c0, c1 > ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Ordered pair membership in the universal class of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
